author: By FOSTER KLUG Associated Press
title: Countries facing pressure to loosen virus restrictions
description: TOKYO (AP) — South Korean officials warned Monday that hard-earned progress fighting the coronavirus pandemic could be upset by new infections at bars and leisure spots, highlighting global tensions between governments desperate to maintain social distancing …
